## RFP - OFFSITE RECORDS STORAGE - ARO

### Tender Details

*   Reference Number: CB-689-73576724
*   Solicitation Number: 1000031051-03
*   Publication Date: January 9, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: February 20, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2029

### Tender Description

The Department of Justice Canada (JUS) invites bidders to submit a proposal for offsite records storage services under a managed services provider (MSP) contract. The MSP will be responsible for storing the JUS's paper-based records inventory and providing records management services.

### Key Requirements

*   The MSP must identify, accession, physically store, and make available to the department the JUS paper records inventory.
*   Records will be stored at offsite warehouses until their retention periods are met and disposed of according to JUS's legislation and corporate policy.
*   The MSP will provide secure storage and retrieval services, with employees cleared to Canadian government security standards.

### Contract Duration

*   The initial contract period is expected to commence on April 1, 2024, and end on March 31, 2029.
*   Optional one (1)-year extensions may be granted for a maximum of five (5) additional years.

### Selection Criteria

*   Bidders will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price.

### Awarding Authority

*   Department of Justice Canada

### Contact Information

*   Jeff Williams, Tendering Authority
*   Email: [jeff.williams@justice.gc.ca](mailto:jeff.williams@justice.gc.ca)
*   Phone: (236) 335-2084

### Document Location

The tender documents are available for download from the Buyandsell.gc.ca website.
